summary: Experimental short film depicting the life, perhaps real, perhaps a dream, of a young girl named Emi. Emi travels to the city where she encounters her counterpart, Sari, and falls in love with...a vampire?
cast: Sari Akasaka|Kyôko Hanyû|Sakio Hirata|Jinichi Isizaki|Jusin Kitamura|Keiko Machida|Misuzu Mori|Yoshiyuki Oka|Donald Richie|Harumi So|Emi Tabata|Tamiko Tachikawa|Ichiro Takahasi|Chigumi Ôbayashi
title: Émotion
